message: Anything in initializers or environment files needs a server restart
That would make sense for me then. My issues were in application.rb & and in an OmniAuth initializer. Thanks.

Essentially what I'm asking is, is there a rule for when the server needs to be restarted? I don't think I've ran into this problem before. Maybe another question would be, has anyone else ran into anything similar?

Recently I ran into a problem where I would change files and the web server doesn't seem to pick it up (yes I saved 8)! The most recent was adding in my twitter key while playing around with OmniAuth. It just didn't seem to pick it up. Once I restarted the web server (WEBrick in RubyMine) it worked flawlessly.

@RyanOnRails another hiccup can be when using local (development) mode versus production mode. Both require server restarts for different level of changes within the stack. But I think you got it now, so I'll leave the thought at that.
